text: Ajaz Anwar is a Pakistani painter. He was born in 1946. He has a PhD. He is currently a professor at the National College of Fine Arts in Lahore. He paints in watercolour. Many of his paintings feature Lahore. He received the presidentâ€™s Pride of Performance award in 1997. ==References== Category:Pakistani painters Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Ajaz Anwar
